inspirations.author: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam (Former President of India)
inspirations.content: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have better tomorrow.

inspirations.author: Audrey Hepburn
inspirations.content: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says “I’m possible”!

inspirations.author: Henry Ford
inspirations.content: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
inspirations.author: Albert Einstein
Georg C. Lichtenberg
inspirations.content: It is strange that only extraordinary men make the discoveries, which later appear so easy and simple.

inspirations.author: Thomas Chrowder Chamberlin
inspirations.content: Falsity in intellectual action is intellectual immorality.

inspirations.author: Albert Einstein
inspirations.content: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
inspirations.author: Charles Darwin
Galileo
inspirations.content: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him discover it in himself.

inspirations.author: Isaac Newton
inspirations.content: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.
